text: Tranmere Rovers Football Club is an English football club. They were a member of The Football League until 2015, when they were relegated to the Football Conference. They returned to the football league in 2018. Their main rivals are Chester, Wrexham, Bolton, Oldham, Manchester United, Altrincham, Barrow AFC, Lancaster City, Crewe Alexandra, Liverpool, Swindon, Stockport County, Southport, Blackburn, Burnley, Chorley, Bury, Macclesfield, Rochdale, Accrington Stanley, Carlisle United, Blackpool, Preston North End, Fleetwood Town, Wigan Athletic, Salford City, Marine AFC, Shrewsbury, Bradford City, Port Vale, Everton and Forest Green. == Name == * 1884–1885 Belmont F.C. * 1885–present Tranmere Rovers F.C. == League position == Season League Position 2000/01 First Division 24th 2001/02 Second Division 12th 2002/03 Second Division 7th 2003/04 Second Division 8th 2004/05 League One 3rd 2005/06 League One 18th 2006/07 League One 9th 2007/08 League One 11th 2008/09 League One 7th 2009/10 League One 19th === Former position === Category:1884 establishments in England Category:Birkenhead Category:English football clubs Category:Organisations based in Merseyside
title: Tranmere Rovers F.C.
